REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f1682 reute b f BC-/GOTABANKEN-AND-UNIT 03-30 0086

TEXT.TITLE: GOTABANKEN AND UNIT MAY BE DOWNGRADED BY MOODY'S
TEXT.BODY: Moody's Investors Service Inc said it may downgrade 2.2 billion crowns of debt of <Gotabanken> and its unit, Gotabanken Inc. The rating agency cited concerns over the company's asset quality. Gotabanken was Sweden's fourth-largest commercial bank in 1985 based on consolidated assets of 45.4 billion crowns. Under review for possible downgrade are Gotabanken's Prime-1 short-term deposits and the unit's same-rated commercial paper. Reuter
